Private Graph Neural Network Go to Andre's Github

Implemented the GAP GNN paper with modifications to improve the accuracy/privacy tradeoff. We conducted several experiments to verify our approach and compare it to the original author's.

Social Media Backend Go to Andre's Github

This is a REST CRUD API for a social media app. Users can create an account, login using oauth2, post, make friends with other accounts, see other's posts, and like posts.
